review: I recently underwent  full mouth dental implants with Dr Urvi Ashar . Being a diabetic patient with a history of bypass surgery i was properly guided and informed about the procedure.I am finally happy to have all my teeth back so that I can enjoy my food now. The whole procedure was painfree and safely done. I would definitely recommend anyone to visit her for dental implants.

tags: None
review:
Dr. Menaz is an excellent doctor , who takes her time with the patient to understand the problem and give her diagnosis . She makes you feel at ease and does a thorough and professional job.
What was very different here was that they even called up to follow up and check on the condition of the patient and assess the need for any change in the medication / treatment.

Overall this was the first time I have had a fantastic experience at the dentist-- for that matter at any doctors.

Thank you doctor.
reply_text:
Thank you for appreciating our efforts to provide you with quality care. It is so nice to hear that you had a good experience and felt at ease. It really means a lot to us!
Hoping to see you at your next follow-up...Keep smiling!!!
Thank you,
Dr. Menaz

review: Got cleaning and fillings done at the Roots Dental Clinic. It was a seamless, timely and extremely comfortable experience. Recommend this clinic for all dental related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: This was my first visit to Roots. Earlier I have been taking dental treatment at Jaipur and Ahmedabad for last 10 years but I have never come across a more skilled dentist. In all my previous experiences I used to feel great pain but she didn't let me feel much pain and even if I felt some she immediately knew it and stopped. I would surely recommend her. She honestly told me that mine is a long treatment. I suggest they should have full mouth x-ray machine so that patients' time is saved.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was treated by Ms Urvi. She was very agile in her work. My cavity fillings along with my dental cleanup and smoothing took about 30 mins Max. This included her explaining me the issues, me telling her my problems and well knowing what else is to be done. I would surely recommend this dental clinic. I felt the price to be a bit higher though. But well, at least it's worth the care which is given.
